Package com.bookingmx.reservation.service

Class ReservationService

java.lang.Object
com.bookingmx.reservation.service.ReservationService
public class ReservationService extends Object
Service layer for managing hotel reservations. This class orchestrates the business logic for creating, updating, canceling, and searching reservations. It integrates all utility classes and the repository to provide a comprehensive reservation management system. This service handles: - Reservation creation with validation - Availability checking before booking - Price calculation with discounts - Reservation cancellation and confirmation - Search and filtering operations
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
BookingMx Development Team

  • Method Details

    • createReservation

      public Reservation createReservation(String guestName, String guestEmail, LocalDate checkInDate, LocalDate checkOutDate, RoomType roomType) throws InvalidReservationException
      Creates a new reservation with full validation. This method performs the following checks: 1. Validates guest information 2. Validates date range 3. Checks room availability 4. Calculates price with discounts 5. Saves the reservation
      Parameters:
      guestName - the name of the guest
      guestEmail - the email of the guest
      checkInDate - the check-in date
      checkOutDate - the check-out date
      roomType - the type of room requested
      Returns:
      the created reservation
      Throws:
      InvalidReservationException - if validation fails or room is not available

    • findReservationById

      public Reservation findReservationById(String reservationId) throws ReservationNotFoundException
      Finds a reservation by its ID.
      Parameters:
      reservationId - the ID of the reservation to find
      Returns:
      the reservation if found
      Throws:
      ReservationNotFoundException - if no reservation exists with the given ID

    • getAllReservations

      public List<Reservation> getAllReservations()
      Retrieves all reservations in the system.
      Returns:
      a list of all reservations

    • confirmReservation

      public Reservation confirmReservation(String reservationId) throws ReservationNotFoundException, InvalidReservationException
      Confirms a pending reservation. Only reservations in PENDING status can be confirmed.
      Parameters:
      reservationId - the ID of the reservation to confirm
      Returns:
      the confirmed reservation
      Throws:
      ReservationNotFoundException - if reservation doesn't exist
      InvalidReservationException - if reservation cannot be confirmed

    • cancelReservation

      public Reservation cancelReservation(String reservationId) throws ReservationNotFoundException, InvalidReservationException
      Cancels an existing reservation.
      Parameters:
      reservationId - the ID of the reservation to cancel
      Returns:
      the cancelled reservation
      Throws:
      ReservationNotFoundException - if reservation doesn't exist
      InvalidReservationException - if reservation cannot be cancelled

    • updateReservationDates

      public Reservation updateReservationDates(String reservationId, LocalDate newCheckInDate, LocalDate newCheckOutDate) throws ReservationNotFoundException, InvalidReservationException
      Updates a reservation's dates. This method checks availability for the new dates before updating.
      Parameters:
      reservationId - the ID of the reservation to update
      newCheckInDate - the new check-in date
      newCheckOutDate - the new check-out date
      Returns:
      the updated reservation
      Throws:
      ReservationNotFoundException - if reservation doesn't exist
      InvalidReservationException - if new dates are invalid or room not available

    • findReservationsByGuestName

      public List<Reservation> findReservationsByGuestName(String guestName)
      Searches for reservations by guest name.
      Parameters:
      guestName - the name to search for (case-insensitive, partial match)
      Returns:
      list of matching reservations

    • findReservationsByGuestEmail

      public List<Reservation> findReservationsByGuestEmail(String guestEmail)
      Searches for reservations by guest email.
      Parameters:
      guestEmail - the email to search for (case-insensitive)
      Returns:
      list of matching reservations

      Returns:

      Returns:

    • findReservationsForDateRange

      public List<Reservation> findReservationsForDateRange(LocalDate checkInDate, LocalDate checkOutDate)
      Finds all reservations that overlap with a given date range. Useful for finding potential conflicts or occupancy reports.
      Parameters:
      checkInDate - the start date of the range
      checkOutDate - the end date of the range
      Returns:
      list of reservations that overlap with the date range

    • getAvailabilityReport

      public AvailabilityChecker.AvailabilityReport getAvailabilityReport(LocalDate checkInDate, LocalDate checkOutDate)
      Gets availability report for a specific date range.
      Parameters:
      checkInDate - the check-in date
      checkOutDate - the check-out date
      Returns:
      an AvailabilityReport showing availability for all room types

    • isRoomAvailable

      public boolean isRoomAvailable(RoomType roomType, LocalDate checkInDate, LocalDate checkOutDate)
      Checks if a specific room type is available for given dates.
      Parameters:
      roomType - the room type to check
      checkInDate - the check-in date
      checkOutDate - the check-out date
      Returns:
      true if at least one room is available, false otherwise

    • getAvailableRoomCount

      public int getAvailableRoomCount(RoomType roomType, LocalDate checkInDate, LocalDate checkOutDate)
      Gets the number of available rooms for a specific type and date range.
      Parameters:
      roomType - the room type to check
      checkInDate - the check-in date
      checkOutDate - the check-out date
      Returns:
      the number of available rooms

    • getPriceQuote

      public PriceCalculator.PriceBreakdown getPriceQuote(RoomType roomType, LocalDate checkInDate, LocalDate checkOutDate) throws InvalidReservationException
      Calculates a price quote for a potential reservation without creating it.
      Parameters:
      roomType - the room type
      checkInDate - the check-in date
      checkOutDate - the check-out date
      Returns:
      a PriceBreakdown showing detailed pricing information
      Throws:
      InvalidReservationException - if dates are invalid

    • getReservationSummary

      public String getReservationSummary()
      Gets count of reservations grouped by status. Useful for dashboard and reporting.
      Returns:
      a string summary of reservation counts by status

    • deleteReservation

      public boolean deleteReservation(String reservationId)
      Deletes a reservation from the system. Use with caution - this permanently removes the reservation.
      Parameters:
      reservationId - the ID of the reservation to delete
      Returns:
      true if deleted successfully, false if not found
